SEARCH
Package source.Entity

Class Camp

java.lang.Object
source.Entity.Camp
public class Camp extends Object
The Camp class is an entity class that can be accessed by both Staff and Students to access any relevant information to this camp
Since:
11/20/2023
Author:
Isaac Chun

  • Constructor Details

    • Camp

      public Camp(CampInfo campInfo, boolean visibility, ArrayList<Enquiry> enquiryList, ArrayList<Student> attendees, ArrayList<Student> campCommitteeMembers, ArrayList<Student> blacklisted)
      An overloaded constructor to initialize the initial values of the camp
      Parameters:
      campInfo - A wrapper to store all the information related to this camp
      visibility - A boolean to dictate whether this camp is visible
      enquiryList - The list of enquiries stored in this camp
      attendees - The attendees of this camp
      campCommitteeMembers - The camp committee members of this camp
      blacklisted - A list of students that are not allowed to join back this camp
